title: Is this glitched?
body: I got the honorable opponent little icon, and dont ever remeber getting a ribbon, and there is no way I could have been in the top 10%. Is there anyway I Riot can tell me?

replies.body: Looks like you might have!  We don't have specific context to offer just yet, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) once we're done distributing by September 30.  We should be able to give you more details specific to you then.
